name: Touch (Season 1)
summary:
FOX电视台新剧《Touch》由著名编剧Tim Kring与制作人Peter Chernin和Katherine Pope联手打造。该剧涉及超自然力量，在剧中科学与灵性相交融，所有人都联系成一个整体，并且通过看不见的方式互相影响和改变着他人的命运。
　　《Touch》开篇首先呈献给观众几个看上去似乎互不相关的角色——第一个是一位消防员，他因为没能拯救一位快要死去的妇女而痛苦不堪；然后是一位即将为家庭赴汤蹈火的一个伊拉克年轻人；其次是一位天才歌手，他在卡拉ok的举动拯救了千里之外的千千万万个生命；最后是一位英国商人，他不顾一切地找回他丢失的手机里一条重要的信息。通过绝妙的叙事方式，《Touch》把这些人之间直接和间接的相互影响一一讲述。
　　但《Touch》的主角却是一位丧妻的单身父亲Martin Bohm。Martin因为无法跟自己沉默寡言且极度自闭的11岁儿子Jake交流而烦恼不已。虽然Martin有爱、机智且体贴，但他所有与儿子试图交谈的尝试全部以失败告终——Jake总是面无表情，无动于衷，不让任何一个人碰触他，包括他的父亲，而自己却一整天在捣腾些报废的手机，把它们拆解，然后通过摆弄零部件，用他自己特别的方式来看这个世界。
　　在多次尝试把Jake留在学校学习失败后，Martin一家引起了社工Clea Hopkins的注意。她拜访了Martin的家，并且坚持要对Jake的生活环境进行评估。Clea虽然工作经验没有那么丰富，但她一眼就看出来Martin的全部生活已经被一个他再也无法控制的小孩所支配。而且她认为Martin为了跟Jake交流所做的尝试全是徒劳的，所以Clea决定要让政府来介入解决这个家庭问题。但是，当Martin发现自己的儿子拥有异于常人的天分时，一切都改变了——Jake拥有着自己独特的预见事情的能力，还掌握着连接任何事物的模式。实际上Jake一直在与他人交流，只不过不是用语言，而是通过数字。现在Jake需要他的父亲Martin去破解这些数字的含义，并把它们跟上文提到的几个开篇出现的人物联系到一起，因为这些数字影响着他们的命运。
　　在这个过程中，Martin得到了退休老教授Boris Podolsky的指导与帮助。Boris根据Jake和他的特殊能力提出了一个不可思议但是又令人信服的理论：我们都是这个互相关联且精密无比的宇宙的一份子，不管是机遇、巧合、时机、合力或者是命运的原因，总是会有触及到我们所有人的事件发生。

eps.desc: Clea continues to force Martin to return Jake to the board-and-carehome, which he does despite his new-found communication with Jake. However, Jake then leads Martin to a pawn shop owner named Arnie (Jude Ciccolella). Moments later a robber comes in and shoots Arnie, and although Arnie survives he does not look pleased that he did. Jake escapes the institution to help Martin piece things together; at the same time a flight attendant (Amy Sloan) helps a young Indian man carry his father's ashes to the New York Stadium; a Russian boy realizes that the reason he may have no friends is because his father hurts people; Arnie attempts to commit suicide as he is suffering from terminal cancer and fears that he has no one to love him. In the end, the Russian boy's father was the employer of the robber of the pawn shop, who gives him a second chance in life. The flight attendant was Arnie's daughter, who arrives abruptly and agrees to stand by him. The young Indian man finds an entrance to the stadium and spreads his father's ashes in the center of the field in hopes of finally making his father proud.

eps.name: Safety in Numbers
eps.desc: Jake gives Martin the number "3287", which leads him to finding another person with the same skills as Jake. With the help of him and Jake, Martin exposes a corporate conspiracy while a dance competition connects people around the world.

eps.name: Kite Strings
eps.desc: Lottery winner Randall returns to suggest that his winning numbers related to Sarah, Martin's wife and Jake's mother who was killed on 9/11. Jake offers Martin the next number, 9.5. Martin surveys Sarah's datebook to see that she was to visit a jeweller on September 5. There, he finds a ring she was having engraved with "1+1=3"—her, Martin, and Jake.

eps.name: Entanglement
eps.desc: The number 22 figures in this episode as Jake's evaluation draws near. The number leads Martin to a bus and a girl named Marisol seeking revenge on the man who murdered her family. Teller tries to bond with Norah, his socially-outcast daughter.
